sub_title: International Outreach Associate at the Committee for Human Rights in North Korea (HRNK)
summary:
I am currently located in Taipei where I learn Mandarin at National Taiwan Normal University's Mandarin Training Center. I am also a North Korean human rights analyst and advocate in my capacity as International Outreach Associate at the Committee for Human Rights in North Korea (HRNK).

My core interests are EU foreign policy, U.S. politics and foreign policy, East Asian affairs (including but not limited to the Korean Peninsula and Cross-Strait Relations), human rights, (multilateral) diplomacy, and humanitarian assistance.

Please do not hesitate to reach out and send me a message.
